krpano.title: Fairchild Baldwin Virtual Store

style.name: skin_hotspotstyle
style.onclick: if(linkedscene, tween(scale,0.25,0.5); tween(oy,-20,0.5); tween(alpha,0,0.5); set(events.onloadcomplete,null); looktohotspot(); loadscene(get(linkedscene),null,MERGE,BLEND(1)); skin_updatescroll(); );

krpano.action: if(device.desktop, if(stagewidth LT 1200, set(layer[Render Logo Desktop].scale,0.10); , set(layer[Render Logo Desktop].scale,0.15); ); if(stagewidth LT 1090, set(layer[Render Logo Desktop].y,60); , set(layer[Render Logo Desktop].y,15); ); if(stagewidth GE 1200, tween(hotspot[spot1].scale,0.5); tween(hotspot[spot2].scale,0.5); tween(hotspot[spot3].scale,0.5); tween(hotspot[spot4].scale,0.5); tween(hotspot[spot5].scale,0.5); tween(hotspot[spot6].scale,0.5); tween(hotspot[spot7].scale,0.5); tween(hotspot[spot8].scale,0.5); tween(hotspot[spot9].scale,0.5); tween(hotspot[spot10].scale,0.5); ); if((stagewidth LT 1200) AND (stagewidth GE 1000), tween(hotspot[spot1].scale,0.45); tween(hotspot[spot2].scale,0.45); tween(hotspot[spot3].scale,0.45); tween(hotspot[spot4].scale,0.45); tween(hotspot[spot5].scale,0.45); tween(hotspot[spot6].scale,0.45); tween(hotspot[spot7].scale,0.45); tween(hotspot[spot8].scale,0.45); tween(hotspot[spot9].scale,0.45); tween(hotspot[spot10].scale,0.45); ); if((stagewidth LT 1000) AND (stagewidth GE 800), tween(hotspot[spot1].scale,0.4); tween(hotspot[spot2].scale,0.4); tween(hotspot[spot3].scale,0.4); tween(hotspot[spot4].scale,0.4); tween(hotspot[spot5].scale,0.4); tween(hotspot[spot6].scale,0.4); tween(hotspot[spot7].scale,0.4); tween(hotspot[spot8].scale,0.4); tween(hotspot[spot9].scale,0.4); tween(hotspot[spot10].scale,0.4); ); if(stagewidth LT 800, tween(hotspot[spot1].scale,0.35); tween(hotspot[spot2].scale,0.35); tween(hotspot[spot3].scale,0.35); tween(hotspot[spot4].scale,0.35); tween(hotspot[spot5].scale,0.35); tween(hotspot[spot6].scale,0.35); tween(hotspot[spot7].scale,0.35); tween(hotspot[spot8].scale,0.35); tween(hotspot[spot9].scale,0.35); tween(hotspot[spot10].scale,0.35); ); ); div(screenaspect, stagewidth, stageheight); div(imageaspect_we, layer[Welcome].imagewidth, layer[Welcome].imageheight); if(imageaspect_we GT screenaspect, set(layer[Welcome].width,85%); set(layer[Welcome].height,prop); , set(layer[Welcome].width,prop); set(layer[Welcome].height,65%); ); div(fplan, layer[Floorplan].imagewidth, layer[Floorplan].imageheight); if(fplan GT screenaspect, set(layer[Floorplan].width,85%); set(layer[Floorplan].height,prop); , set(layer[Floorplan].width,prop); set(layer[Floorplan].height,90%); ); div(holderaspect, layer[holder].imagewidth, layer[holder].imageheight); if(holderaspect GE screenaspect, set(layer[holder].width,prop); set(layer[holder].height,101%); , set(layer[holder].width,101%); set(layer[holder].height,prop); );

if(stagewidth GE 1000, tween(plugin[A1].scale,1.0); tween(plugin[A2].scale,1.0); tween(plugin[A3].scale,1.0); ); if(stagewidth LT 1000, tween(plugin[A1].scale,0.8); tween(plugin[A2].scale,0.8); tween(plugin[A3].scale,0.8); );

set(temp,%1); txtadd(Abust,get(temp),1,bust); txtadd(A,get(temp),1); txtadd(B,get(temp),2); txtadd(C,get(temp),3); set(hotspot[drawer01].visible,true); set(hotspot[BackToShopping].visible,true); tween(hotspot[BackToShopping].alpha,1.0); set(hotspot[get(Abust)].visible,true); tween(hotspot[get(Abust)].alpha,1.0); set(hotspot[get(A)].visible,true); set(hotspot[get(B)].visible,true); set(hotspot[get(C)].visible,true); lookto(0,60,100,smooth(80,80,200)); set(view.limitview,lookat); set(view.hlookatmin,-20); set(view.hlookatmax,20); set(view.vlookatmin,40); set(view.vlookatmax,65);

set(temp,%1); txtadd(A,get(temp),1,bust); txtadd(B,get(temp),2,bust); txtadd(C,get(temp),3,bust); set(hotspot[get(A)].visible,false); set(hotspot[get(B)].visible,false); set(hotspot[get(C)].visible,false);

set(temp,%1); set(view.limitview,auto); set(view.hlookatmin,-180); set(view.hlookatmax,180); set(view.vlookatmin,-180); set(view.vlookatmax,180); delayedcall(.01,lookto(0,0,105,smooth(80,80,200));); txtadd(Abust,get(temp),1,bust); txtadd(Bbust,get(temp),2,bust); txtadd(Cbust,get(temp),3,bust); txtadd(A,get(temp),1); txtadd(B,get(temp),2); txtadd(C,get(temp),3); delayedcall(0.5,set(hotspot[BackToShopping].visible,false);); tween(hotspot[BackToShopping].alpha,0.0,0.49); delayedcall(0.5,set(hotspot[drawer01].visible,false);); delayedcall(0.5, set(hotspot[get(A)].visible,false); set(hotspot[get(B)].visible,false); set(hotspot[get(C)].visible,false); set(hotspot[get(Abust)].visible,false); ); tween(hotspot[get(Abust)].alpha,0.0,0.49); delayedcall(0.5,set(hotspot[get(Bbust)].visible,false);); tween(hotspot[get(Bbust)].alpha,0.0,0.49); delayedcall(0.,set(hotspot[get(Cbust)].visible,false);); tween(hotspot[get(Cbust)].alpha,0.0,0.49); delayedcall(0.52, set(hotspot[get(Bbust)].alpha,1.0); set(hotspot[get(Cbust)].alpha,1.0); );

if(%1 == close, delayedcall(0.5,tween(layer[bground].bgalpha,0.0,0.3);); delayedcall(0.81,set(layer[bground].visible,false);); tween(plugin[get(temp1)].alpha,0.0,0.6); delayedcall(.61, set(plugin[get(temp1)].visible,false);); delayedcall(.61, set(layer[left-block].visible,false); set(layer[left-block].enabled,enabled); ); set(plugin[get(temp1)].enabled,false); ); if(%1 != close, set(temp1,%1); tween(layer[bground].bgalpha,0.85,0.4); set(layer[bground].visible,true); set(layer[left-block].visible,true); set(layer[left-block].enabled,true); delayedcall(0.41,tween(plugin[get(temp1)].alpha,1.0,0.6);); set(plugin[get(temp1)].visible,true); set(plugin[get(temp1)].enabled,true); atc_size(); );

div(hfov,%1,57.295779); div(yaw,%2,-57.295779); div(pitch,%3,57.295779); div(roll,%4,-57.295779); mul(hfov,0.5);Math.tan(hfov);mul(width,hfov,1000);set(height,'prop'); Math.cos(ch,yaw);Math.sin(sh,yaw); Math.cos(ca,pitch);Math.sin(sa,pitch); Math.cos(cb,roll);Math.sin(sb,roll); mul(m0,ca,ch); mul(tmp,cb,sa);mul(tmp,ch);mul(tmp2,sb,sh);add(m3,tmp,tmp2); mul(m4,cb,ca); mul(tmp,cb,sa);mul(tmp,sh);mul(tmp2,sb,ch);sub(m5n,tmp,tmp2);mul(m5n,-1); mul(tmp,sb,sa);mul(tmp,ch);mul(tmp2,cb,sh);sub(m6n,tmp,tmp2);mul(m6n,-1); Math.atan2(yaw,m6n,m0); Math.atan2(roll,m5n,m4); Math.asin(pitch,m3); mul(ath,yaw,57.295779); mul(atv,pitch,57.295779); mul(rotate,roll,57.295779);
if(startscene === null, copy(startscene,scene[0].name)); loadscene(get(startscene), null, MERGE);

scene.name: scene_Entryway
scene.title: Entryway

hotspot.name: J Lookbook
hotspot.onclick: set(layer[slideb].visible,true); tween(layer[slideb].bgalpha,0.85,0.6); tween(layer[closelb].alpha,0.35,1.0,easeInQuad); set(layer[closelb].visible,true); tween(layer[next-p].alpha,1.0,1.0,easeInQuad); set(layer[next-p].visible,true); tween(layer[prev-p].alpha,1.0,1.0,easeInQuad); set(layer[prev-p].visible,true); delayedcall(0.8, jslide(base););

layer.name: slideb
layer.onclick: delayedcall(1.2, tween(layer[slideb].bgalpha,0.0,0.6);); tween(layer[slide1].alpha,0.0,1.0); delayedcall(1.81,set(layer[slideb].visible,false);); tween(layer[closelb].alpha,0.0,1.0); delayedcall(1.01,set(layer[closelb].visible,false);); tween(layer[next-p].alpha,0.0,1.0); delayedcall(1.01,set(layer[next-p].visible,false);); tween(layer[prev-p].alpha,0.0,1.0); delayedcall(1.01,set(layer[prev-p].visible,false);); jslide(close);

layer.name: closelb
layer.onclick: delayedcall(1.2, tween(layer[slideb].bgalpha,0.0,0.6);); tween(layer[slide1].alpha,0.0,1.0); delayedcall(1.81,set(layer[slideb].visible,false);); tween(layer[closelb].alpha,0.0,1.0); delayedcall(1.01,set(layer[closelb].visible,false);); tween(layer[next-p].alpha,0.0,1.0); delayedcall(1.01,set(layer[next-p].visible,false);); tween(layer[prev-p].alpha,0.0,1.0); delayedcall(1.01,set(layer[prev-p].visible,false);); jslide(close);

scene.action: set(a,%1); if(a == base, set(i,0);); if((a == null) OR (a == decr), set(layer[prev-button].enabled, false); set(layer[next-button].enabled, false); delayedcall(0.66, set(layer[prev-button].enabled, true);); delayedcall(0.66, set(layer[next-button].enabled, true);); ); if((a == ee) OR (a == ff), if((a == ee) AND (i LT 18), tween(layer[next-glow].alpha,1.0,0.3,easeInQuad); tween(layer[next-arrow].alpha,0.85,0.3,easeInQuad);); if((a == ff) AND (i GT 1), tween(layer[prev-glow].alpha,1.0,0.3,easeInQuad); tween(layer[prev-arrow].alpha,0.85,0.3,easeInQuad);); , if(a == close, invis(get(i)); , if((i LT 18) AND (a != base) AND (a != decr), invis(get(i)); ); if((i GT 1) AND (a == decr), invis(get(i)); ); if(a == base, inc(i); vis(get(i)); , delayedcall(.6501, if((a == decr) AND (i GT 1), dec(i);); if((a != decr) AND (i LT 18), inc(i);); vis(get(i)); ); ); ); );

plugin.name: A1
plugin.html: [div id="iframe-wrapper" style="text-align:center;width:100%;"] [style].embed-container { height: 1600px; width: 100%; overflow: hidden;} .embed-container iframe, .embed-container object, .embed-container embed { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } #my-iframe{ position: absolute; margin-top: -1000px; left : 0; width : 100%; height: 1600px;} [/style][div class='embed-container'][iframe src="http://www.fairchildbaldwin.com/classics/opaline-ruby" id="my-iframe" frameborder="0" align="center" scrolling="no"][/iframe][/div][/div]
